subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT - CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm
ET/PT

PARIS PROFITS?!?
Is Paris
Hilton about to cash-in big time on her jail
time? And why are her neighbors so angry about what
will
happen when she is released from jail? Showbiz Tonight
with the
outrage and the controversy.

A "THE
VIEW" SHOCKER: MAN TO REPLACE ROSIE?
So many people
have been named as possible replacements for
Rosie
O'Donnell on "The View." But now, Showbiz Tonight is
hearing that it could be a guy! We're digging for
answers to find out which dude, if any, will turn up on
this
daytime talker!

CELEBRITY SEX TAPES!
Long before she went to jail, Paris Hilton got really,
really
famous, mostly because of a sex tape! It put her on
the map,
and she's not the only one! The Hollywood
landscape is littered
with sex tapes, and they are not
always bad for a career. From
Paris to Pam Anderson to even
Screech from "Saved By The
Bell," Showbiz Tonight
investigates celebrity sex tapes.

JON BON JOVI ON
THE 2008 PRESIDENTIAL RACE
Showbiz Tonight's revealing
interview with the front man for
the rock group, Bon Jovi.
Jon's been really involved in
previous campaigns. Tonight,
our very own A.J. Hammer asks him
who he is going to throw
his support behind this time.

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT
QUESTION OF THE DAY:
Paris Hilton: Is it OK for her to
profit from her jail time?
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT

SEND US A VIDEO E-MAIL! 
We want to hear
your response to the Question of the Day, or
whatever else
is on your mind, on video. Responses must be no
longer than
30 seconds. To do it, just head to
cnn.com/showbiztonight
Then tune in to see your video e-mail
on TV!
